title: Expecting all properties to be returned when creating a RACING EVENT
gherkin:
When the user creates a "RACING EVENT" "GP Monaco" with the following data
  | key | value | datatype |
  | name | GP Monaco | string |
  | round | 7 | number |
  | date_from | 2025-05-20 | string |
  | date_to | 2025-05-22 | string |
Then the response should contain the following properties
  | key | value | datatype |
  | name | GP Monaco | string |
  | round | 7 | number |
  | date_from | 2025-05-20 | string |
  | date_to | 2025-05-22 | string |
